text: Nde ganɨ! Ana mbu buiva hurivige phorga zeri. Kha gumgi gu mbigi, mbe bevbevira za wari won rɨmgira ana gangirga. Mba fugar ana segi gumgi, mbe bevbevira za ana ganɨnga. Kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi, mbe za ana ndɨkndɨgɨp, ana korar muuŋv, thagir nzir muunga. Ahaŋ, kha bigi guigira hɨrga. Ne guigi guarara.
